entry.description: contains the OEM public key hash as set by OEM
entry.name: root_cert_hash

entry.description: SHA256 signed root cert to generate root hash
entry.name: root_cert_file

entry.description: PK Hash is in Fuse for SEC_BOOT1 : Apps
entry.name: SEC_BOOT1_PK_Hash_in_Fuse

entry.description: If PK Hash in Fuse is 0, then this index selects which of 16 keys in ROM to use
entry.name: SEC_BOOT1_rom_pk_hash_index

entry.description: Use Serial Num for secure boot authentication (0: Use OEM ID (Default), 1: Use Serial Num)
entry.name: SEC_BOOT1_use_serial_num

entry.description: PK Hash is in Fuse for SEC_BOOT2 : MBA
entry.name: SEC_BOOT2_PK_Hash_in_Fuse

entry.description: If PK Hash in Fuse is 0, then this index selects which of 16 keys in ROM to use
entry.name: SEC_BOOT2_rom_pk_hash_index

entry.description: Use Serial Num for secure boot authentication (0: Use OEM ID (Default), 1: Use Serial Num)
entry.name: SEC_BOOT2_use_serial_num

entry.description: PK Hash is in Fuse for SEC_BOOT3 : MPSS
entry.name: SEC_BOOT3_PK_Hash_in_Fuse

entry.description: If PK Hash in Fuse is 0, then this index selects which of 16 keys in ROM to use
entry.name: SEC_BOOT3_rom_pk_hash_index

entry.description: Use Serial Num for secure boot authentication (0: Use OEM ID (Default), 1: Use Serial Num)
entry.name: SEC_BOOT3_use_serial_num

entry.description: used to configure the number of root certificates hashed into OEM_PK_HASH
entry.name: mrc_cert_count

entry.description: index is used to select the Root Certificate
entry.name: mrc_pk_hash_index

entry.description: index is used to select the Modem Root Certificate
entry.name: modem_mrc_pk_hash_index

entry.description: allowing bus DCVS SW feature will require and set APPS_NIDEN_DISABLE to 0
entry.name: allow_bus_dcvs

entry.description: prevents the Watch Dog from being disabled by the GPIO, true: ignore GPIO, false: use GPIO
entry.name: watchdog_enable
